text: You could create a export_to_template_context text field for your alt text
Would be nice to have the "Alt" field optional so it doesn't clutter the page editor for background image selectors. I def like that you made the sizes optional.
I created a post for this on the idea forum <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-ALT-Text-field-at-the-file-manager-level/idi-p/198803>
KUDOVOTED

the only issue with that forum is i find it to be more Marketer needs then dev, whenever I have posted dev related suggestions they get buried or hardly ever looked at. We should have a dev idea forum
agreed 100%

I feel like right now this slack is where 
Step1: ideas get posted
Step2: HS Devs see them
Step3: ??????
Step 4: Matt Coley or WSpiro Luke or Shawn post a message casually - oh yea, that works now.
but if step 2 doesn’t happen it goes to idea purgatory
double upvote

lol maybe that or we rig the idea forum system. create like a tool that whenever  one of us posts pings slack or something and everyone can just read the title and  if they thumb up it pings back to the idea forum a thumbs up.

So all of our posts would be like instant +20 upvotes
Maybe there could be a pinned list of ideas

while I like that - downside is since they’re not paying for the history - the original posts will get old within a week or so and so people wont get anything other than the pinned summary of the idea. which may not give full context or whatnot
unless you were thinking pinning a list of ideas in the idea forum
that’d be a good solution
lol, game the system
Or maybe a Google sheet?
I was thinking to myself what’d be cool is to have a list like interface where people could upvote/downvote click on the title to view more details etc.

though downvotes people might feel hurt.

So basically that gives us just a new ideas forum.

The PM software we use uses this setup powered by Canny that's easy to use for this type of functionality.
<https://feedback.clickup.com/feature-requests>

Can we get this magic toggle added at the template level?
<https://spin.d.pr/dp9YV9+>

I don’t know if it will work for every page on sites I’m redesigning because we sometimes leave old landing pages alone.(clients usually don’t have the budget to have us check through all of em)
I keep a spreadsheet of these, including links to the slack post and relevant ideas community posts. So keep 'em coming :sprocket:

Can we also still please get Content Staging added into the menu so it's not buried multiple clicks deep. It's a PITA to get to, especially when you publish a page in staging and the little "back" link that appears takes you to the normal pages tool instead of Content Staging like it should.
As a temporary solution the <#CBBAW6Z3R|community-browser-extension> adds a developer menu

<https://spin.d.pr/Y4bgj9+> (works in both versions of the header nav)

<https://spin.d.pr/qApfeG+>
its pretty awesome and that menu has saved me soooooo many clicks
Is there any way to copy group from one template to another template directly? I'm not asking for global group. It will be static group contain flexible column.
